img.p: Cirrus Academy Charter School cultivates the academic and artistic talents of our students through an integrated, hands-on curriculum based on Science, Technology, Engineering, Arts, and Math (STEAM). Our goal is to ensure all students have access to the tools and knowledge they need in order to exceed world-class standards. As a charter school we have our own board of directors and are not governed by the county school board, giving us the autonomy and flexibility to make decisions based on our students’ needs.

div.p: As a public school guided by its own board of directors, we accept students from all over Georgia and offer an innovative curriculum that differs from district schools.
Our school has an integrated education program that equally emphasizes academic and artistic excellence based on Science, Technology, Engineering, Arts, and Math (STEAM).
Through our rigorous and artistic curriculum, our students will be prepared to compete against students from all over the world for scholarships, job positions, and more.
